reviewText:
DVD and CD versions featuring these rare/unique songs:
CHRISTMAS HITS' DVD:
Little Drummer Boy - Ray Charles
Silent Night - Bros
The Power Of Love - Frankie Goes To Hollywood
Winter Wonderland - Perry Como & Ann Blyth
The Christmas Song - Randy Crawford
Christmas Time - Bryan Adams
Have Yourself A Merry Little Christmas - The Manhattan Transfer
Nutcrucker Suite - Brian Setzer Orchestra
This One's For The Children - New Kids On The Block
Blue Christmas - Brian Setzer Orchestra
White Christmas - Dionne Warwick featuring Dee Dee Bridgewater & Tosca Snowfall - The Manhattan Transfer [?!]
Last Christmas - Wham Tribute
Hark! The Herald Angels Sing - Charlotte Church
Lonely This Christmas - Mud CHRISTMAS HITS
__________________________________________________________________________
